title: View Configuration
content:
• Home
  • ››Manhattan Active® Supply Chain Planning

  • ››Allocated Supplies
  • ››Allocation Maintenance
  • ››View Configuration

 

 Maintenance View Configuration

 

  •  Maintenance View Configuration
    • Field Description

This configuration screen helps the user to view the list of attributes that were used to compute the allocation.

Users can aggregate the allocated qualities to the stores through a specified list of location attributes.

 
Field Description

Field

Description
Columns

The list of product attributes that the user can use to identify individual products in a pack that's being allocated.

The following columns are available:

1)  Multi Product Pre-Pack

2) Singe Product Pre-Pack

3) Single Product

4) Single Product - View All

Set as Default 

Yes or No

The following options are available:

1) Yes - If you select Yes, then the view definition is saved as the user's preferences.

2) No -   If you select No, then the view definition is not saved as the user's preference.

Users can select a separate default for each version of the allocation maintenance.
Available Aggregation

The list of location level attributes that can be used to summarize per store values.

Select the attributes available in Available Aggregations and drag and drop the attributes to the Selected Aggregations attributes list.

 

The available aggregation are,

1) District

2) Store Size

3) Climate

4) City

5) County

6) State

7) Region

8)  Grade

9) Country

 
Available Attributes

The list of attributes from the allocation result that the user can view to understand the allocation.

Select the attributes available in Available Attributes and drag and drop the attributes to the Selected Attributes attributes list.

 

The available attributes are,

1) Enforce Min

2) Enforce Max

3) On Hand

4) On Order

5) Need

6) RAQ

7) Method

8) Min

9) Max

10) Inv.Pos

11) Omni.Adj

12)  No. Of Weeks

13)  Pack Round Method

14) Days of Supply

15) EST. (Estimated) Sell thru

16) Over Allocation

17) Under Allocation

18) Need Adj.

19) Channel

20) Team
